.. _Contributor:

Contributor's documentation
===========================

Hi there VIKI-contributor. 

You are probably here to learn how to write your own module. If you want something simpler check out the other guides at :ref:`user` or :ref:`developer` contribution to the core.

You can learn how to write modules using the following guides

#. :ref:`modintroduction`
#. :ref:`modtutorial`
#. :ref:`modtaglist`
